Name: Clementina
description:
Sra. Clementina is married and a mother to her family. She works as vegetable vendor at the fairs. Her husband and children are vegetable farmers while she is responsible for selling what they produce.

Clementina is a very active individual who greatly wants to get ahead. She is a hardworking and responsible person when it comes to her commitments.

Clementina is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, compost, and other supplies so that her family can continue farming.
